page.title: 11Primary Schools in Ash.
page.content: Surrey County Council maintain four First schools for children from 5-8 years, and 3 Middle Schools for 8-12 year olds in Ash. The oldest school was opened in 1860, the newest in 1966. All the schools are well equipped with playing areas, fields for sports and games and netball courts. Many of the schools have a musical tradition and organise choirs, brass bands and recorder groups. The children are able to make use of computers ,television and video recorders during school time.Some of the schools keeps a variety of pets which encourages children to care for animals. All schools have a hall which is equipped with gymnastic apparatus.
